title: UserReviewResponse
description: A response from an app owner or representative to a UserReview attestation. Uses refUID to reference the original review.

@context.description: Optional JSON-LD context URI for semantic processing.

attester.title: Attester ID
attester.description: Ethereum address of the entity or representative responding to the review.

subject.title: Subject ID
subject.description: Address of the original reviewer being responded to.

responseBody.title: Response
responseBody.description: Free-form text containing the response to the review.

datePublished.title: Date Published
datePublished.description: Timestamp when the response was written or published, in ISO 8601 format.

anchoredDataURL.title: Anchored Data URL
anchoredDataURL.description: URI pointing to offchain response content (e.g., IPFS, Cloudinary, Arweave).

anchoredDataHash.title: Anchored Data Hash
anchoredDataHash.description: Cryptographic hash of the content located at 'anchoredDataURL'.

issuedAt.title: Issued Date
issuedAt.description: Unix timestamp (in seconds) for when the response was submitted.

expiresAt.title: Expiration Date
expiresAt.description: Optional expiration timestamp for the attestation.
